text:
Mr. Frank Schooley
- 2 -
10/1/52
An official report on our trip abroad will be forthcoming shortly.
I know that you will be extremely pleased with the tremendous
quantity of material that has been arranged for both in radio and
television.
i&th all best wishes, believe me.
As ever.
SNS:LG
Seymour N. Siegel
President
cc: Hr. Auanus
Mr. Paulu
